column5: I bought a whack load of P-line 30 lb test fluorocarbon  intending to make leaders. Like a dolt, I didn't realize that I would need sleeves and a crimper. Can I just use it with a barrel swivel attached to the main line and then tie the fluorocarbon direct to whatever lure I am using? Is 30 lb enough for pike or will they chomp right through it?

30# can be a little light, or just right depending on conditions (heavy cover etc.), there's no problem tying fluro IF you lubricate the knot well before cinching it down. I use saliva or an oil based fish attractant.
IMHO, 30 is too light for pike. I use 80 and am happy with it.  I don't have any trouble tying the 80, and as per GCD, a little lube will do the trick.
